name: Construct RPG Browser
description:
Construct RPG Browser

Artificial Construct for RPG Browser

Browser for games created by Free Form Programming Language:

https://www.researchgate.net/publication/361418125_Free_Form_Programming_Languag...

to allow the designers and players to create their own highly customized and infinitely variational  and in this  case RPG games.

Example

LOW POLY

ccn/dara/simple1

ccn/dara/simple2

ccn/dara/simple4       (Enjoy Teleporting between the regions)

nigeria0/adam/net1  (Teleporting between multiple games from different authors connected)

(Unity Chan Anime characters from Japan)

ccn/dara/combat1    (Enemy AIs die with 1 strike of the player's sword)

ccn/dara/combat2    (Enemy AIs die with 3 strikes of the player's sword)

Enter into the input box on the top left of the screen and might take up to 45s to load the entire game!
